name: Tentacult!
description: Tentacult! is a chaotic swarm control game set in a modern day Pleasantville which meets Lovecraftian Horror as your "Tentacutes" make friends with the community.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Most modern x86 CPUs supported Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 & Xbox One Controller Support
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or higher Processor: Most modern x86 CPUs supported Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 & Xbox One Controller Support

reviews.review_text: Seriously the most fun I have ever had for a dollar. What do you have to lose?

Hello fellow servant of our Lord Cthulhu. You are instructed to make friends for our Lord's tea party. No one can resist our charm, they will be our friends soon enough. Do as our Lord commands, buy this game and make friends. Make lots of friends...

THE GAME IS GREAT FOR JUST 0.99.I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT.BUT THE DOWN SIDE IS THAT THE GAME IS REALLY SHORT AND WILL GET OVER IN 2 HRS OR LESS.I HOPE THEY ADD AN ENDLESS MODE SOON.IF POSSIBLE THEN MASSIVELY MULTIPLAYER TOO.HIGLY RECOMENDED
Simple to play little game,not much thought required to play. Got just under a quid to spare in your Steam Wallet then make Lord Cthulhu happy and buy this game!
